summary: Wish For The Moon - a Spideypool fic
title: Wish For The Moon - a Spideypool fic
body:
https://archiveofourown.org/works/17867324/chapters/42166037

’ “I will allow you to spare your uncle’s life. In return, you will give yourself to me. I will be your one and only master, and you will submit to me without question.”

Peter’s blood cooled like a winter steam. Did the monster mean he simply wanted to eat Peter, have him as a servant, or did he mean ‘submit’ in the broader sense? He was, for all intents and purposes, a man, and Peter knew men desired more of the flesh than just warmth…’

Peter Parker is a bright young man with a starry future ahead of him. That is until his uncle falls sick and he makes a deal with a monster in order to save his life. A deal that involves devoting his body in service to a mysterious, shape-shifting wolf god with an unusually human name…

Historical!AU with elements of Beauty and the Beast and a LOT of smut.

A gift for @mikazure <3

summary: 12. “She’s hiding behind the sofa.” featuring RIPeter
question: 12. “She’s hiding behind the sofa.” featuring RIPeter
answer:
#12. “She’s hiding behind the sofa.”

—

Normality.

You wonder what that feels like. Not that you never had the chance to try – you’ve had plenty. Though, being the wife of Queens most respected superhero, you usually don’t find time to do the normal things with what your schedule consists of.

Especially ever since you birthed him with his own very daughter.

The sun sets slowly on the horizon, the sky is a beautiful blend of oranges and reds and with the occasional blues from what’s left of the clear sky. There’s a slight breeze that wafts through the cracked windows, ruffles your hair, blows the mouth-watering scent of recently baked cookies throughout the room.

Your four-year-old daughter – blonde ringlets, chubby hands, bubbly laughter – darts into the living room.

Awe slips through your veneer, breaking out into a soft smile as you hear the familiar jingle of keys. Seconds later and the door flies open, revealing your slightly disheveled husband.

His eyes scan the room before promptly landing on you, all exhaustion diminishing within an exchange of meeting your eyes. He saunters over to you, smile unavoidable from his bruising cheeks and swollen lip. “Hi,” he presses a single lazy and loving kiss to your cheek, letting it linger with heaviness.

Warmth encapsulates you whole, and you lean into him. “Hungry?” He mumbles a muffled, ’Starving’ against your cheek before pulling away and nuzzling his nose – albeit bruised – against yours. You let out an airy giggle, “Thought so.”

Turning back around to the stove, you stir your pasta despite your mind wandering elsewhere. It’s on your husband, worrying over his aching form even though he tells you not to worry.

“Where’s Olive?” He intently curious and you throw a devious look over your shoulder at him, his face contorting into confusion.

“She’s hiding behind the sofa.”

His face changes, a smile stretching beautifully across his features. He backpedals, giving you a wink. “Such a tattletale.”

It’s not long before you hear the familiar, high-pitch screech of, “Daddy!” and then your aging husband’s, “Olive, no, Wait–”

A chorus of crashes and thumps and bangs resonate through the walls of your home and all you do is shake your head and smile.

Because this…this is your normal.

summary:
Tony: Peter if you don’t get off the ceiling with my baby right now.
Peter: Excuse me? “My baby.” This is the communal baby!...
body:
Tony: Peter if you don’t get off the ceiling with my baby right now.


Peter: Excuse me? “My baby.” This is the communal baby! You’ve had her all day.

Tony: Peter!


Peter: You let Dum-E hold her for an HOUR

Tony:


Peter: An HoUr


Pepper: Can I please just hold my daughter sometime today?

summary: Peter likes to sock skate everywhere. One day, Bucky and Sam cover the floor in clear, double-sided tape and laugh their asses...
body:
Peter likes to sock skate everywhere. One day, Bucky and Sam cover the floor in clear, double-sided tape and laugh their asses off when Peter gets stuck.

Peter, flailing: I’m going to MURDER you

Bucky and Sam, wheezing: good luck with that

Tony, walking in: oh, hey, Pete. looks like you’re in a… sticky situation

title: Foreign Relations
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2SOqAQX

by images_words

Matt Murdock gets a dog, Peter Parker gets a girlfriend, and if one more person calls him “Mr. President,” Steve Rogers is going to scream.
Oh yeah, and Tony Stark has agreed to house the visiting Asgardian Royal Family.

Words: 508, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, M/M, Multi
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Nick Fury, Phil Coulson, Loki (Marvel), Tony Stark, Frank Castle, Matt Murdock, Franklin “Foggy” Nelson, Maria Hill, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Sif (Marvel), Brunnhilde | Valkyrie (Marvel), Peter Parker, Michelle Jones, Sharon Carter (Marvel), Stephen Strange, Happy Hogan, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Pepper Potts, Heimdall (Marvel)
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Loki/Tony Stark, Frank Castle/Matt Murdock, Matt Murdock & Franklin “Foggy” Nelson, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Bruce Banner/Thor, Michelle Jones/Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Bucky Barnes Has PTSD, President Steve Rogers, Does that make Bucky the First Lady, disabled Loki, Deaf Clint Barton, Trans Peter Parker, Interspecies Relationship(s), Alternate Universe, Asgardian Loki (Marvel)

summary:
Sometimes I just wonder cause like.
In most fix-it fics after IW, ones where they reverse the snap, they end up flying back out...
body:
Sometimes I just wonder cause like.

In most fix-it fics after IW, ones where they reverse the snap, they end up flying back out to Titan to rescue Peter, Strange and the Guardians. This implies that you return to where you were when you were dusted.

But, one large problem I have with this is that there was people who weren’t on the ground when they were dusted. There was people on planes and in boats. There was people driving cars and crossing the street.

So what happens to them? If the snap gets reversed, are millions of people even more traumatised because they watched somebody appear in the sky and fall? Are there people who found out the snap was reversed but will never see their loved ones again because they were on a cruise? What if somebody had been crossing the road, and when they come back they’re in front of a car?

That’s something I want to see in a fic. Will I see it? Probably not. But I can hope.

In most fix-it fics after IW, ones where they reverse the snap, they end up flying back out to Titan to rescue Peter, Strange and the Guardians. This implies that you return to where you were when you were dusted.

But, one large problem I have with this is that there was people who weren’t on the ground when they were dusted. There was people on planes and in boats. There was people driving cars and crossing the street.

So what happens to them? If the snap gets reversed, are millions of people even more traumatised because they watched somebody appear in the sky and fall? Are there people who found out the snap was reversed but will never see their loved ones again because they were on a cruise? What if somebody had been crossing the road, and when they come back they’re in front of a car?

That’s something I want to see in a fic. Will I see it? Probably not. But I can hope.
